name: Race Pace #2
description:
Today&apos;s session consists of 4 x 8 minute race pace intervals. However, just like under race conditions, the target power will ramp up over the duration of the interval. Focus on controlled breathing and pedaling at a cadence similar to your race cadence during the intervals.
